posts.post_content:
how many players in the T206 set are wearing catcher masks?

I would be interesting in purchasing PSA3-4 Centered cards....

I think just 4. Kleinow, McLean, Powers & Snodgrass.
Put this display together. Sorry not for sale though.

[quote name="pgellis" post=1467335]I think just 4. Kleinow, McLean, Powers & Snodgrass.
Put this display together. Sorry not for sale though.[/QUOTE]

funny how collectors think a like..going to be in my 'pretty cards display'...but I expanding it into the 'pretty interesting cards' display
Sorry couldn't load photo last night
man only 5 catchers in 1909 to catch all those pitchers!

[quote name="1952boyntoncollector" post=1467460]man only 5 catchers in 1909 to catch all those pitchers![/QUOTE]

Technically speaking there's 48 total cards of catchers. But there's a total of 7 cards that technically have "Catcher" as their pose.
What are the other 2 if you don't count Kleinow twice

[quote name="pgellis" post=1467614]What are the other 2 if you don't count Kleinow twice[/QUOTE]

Like it or not Kleinow does count twice. Photo attached for the offical 7 poses. And below are the 48 I track. Although some on the list played multiple positions I compiled the list of those who caught more games than playing at any other position as being a catcher so it's definitely debatable.

255Kleinow, RedCatchingNew York HighlandersAmerican
256Kleinow, RedCatchingBoston Red SoxAmerican
326McLean, LarryCatchingCincinnati RedsNational
356Needham, TomCatchingChicago CubsNational
397Powers, MikeCatchingPhiladelphia AthleticsAmerican
452Snodgrass, FredCatchingNew York GiantsNational

what about all guys that played any games at catcher....now that would be  a real catcher set..
